install.name: Custom Js Css Html
install.author: Saran Chamling
install.description: Simple module to include extra CSS or Javascripts easily in your joomla pages, Just as the custom HTML module allows you to insert HTML on a specific page, this module allowes you to include extra html, css and javascripts.

param.name: headstuff
param.label: Custom Tags
param.description: Custom Tags in head section of the page

param.name: extrajs
param.label: Extra Javascripts
param.description: Only include declarations, eg : window.addEvent('domready', function() {}));

param.name: cssfiles
param.label: URL to CSS files
param.description: Enter URLs of CSS files, URL per line

param.name: jsfiles
param.label: URL to Javascript files
param.description: Enter URLs of JS files, URL per line

param.name: extrahtml
param.label: HTML or TEXT
param.description: You can put HTML or just Text in your pages.
